item.title: Venezuela shows how locals turn to Tether-issued USDT stablecoin as governments wobble
item.description: Locals in Venezuela, as well as others living under unstable regimes, are turning to USDT as protection from political and economic uncertainties.

item.title: Alibaba-backed startup Moonshot AI's valuation is up $500 million, sources say, after its rivals IPO in Hong Kong
item.description: Investors are valuing the startup at $4.8 billion as it is about to close another funding round, according to two people familiar with the matter.

item.title: Trump threatens to sue JPMorgan Chase for 'debanking' him
item.description: President Trump threatened to sue JPMorgan for allegedly "debanking" him following the Jan. 6 insurrection in 2021.

item.title: Chinese EV giant BYD is a buy â€” and not just for its cars, Bernstein says
item.description: After beating Tesla in the number of electric vehicles sold, BYD has another big business that investors have yet to fully appreciate, according to Be...

item.title: Smaller companies are rising quickly to challenge Big Tech as AI's best trade
item.description: Reliable power, nuclear investment, data-center efficiency, and grid capacity are now core drivers of stock returns from the AI theme as demand ramps.
